summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities; authorizing the Director of Seattle Public Utilities to transfer sewer infrastructure to King County; and to relinquish portions of two sewer main easements in King County Parcel No. 2824049007, known as 7777 Perimeter Road South, King County International Airport, Seattle; and to declare portions of the easements and associated sewer infrastructure in the above property surplus to the City of Seattle's needs.
